tests.id: ID of the test. Must be unique. Generated UUID if not specified.
tests.file: Output only. File the test is defined in. All actions for a given test must be defined in a single file.
tests.status: Output only. The status of the test based on test action results. Possible values: PASS, WARNING, FAIL

result.status: Output only. The status based on test action results. Possible values: PASS, WARNING, FAIL
result.description: Output only. Explaination of the action result.
result.image: Output only. The file path for an output image.
result.video: Output only. The file path for an output video.

actions.line: The line number that the test action definition begins on.
actions.css: CSS selectors that resolve to the element. Only returns the first element that matches the selectors.
actions.keys: Strings of keys of enter. Only for sendKeys action. ENTER is a reserved enum that triggers the Enter key.
actions.trailingSpecialKey: A special key prssed after the 'keys' value. Supported values: https://github.com/puppeteer/puppeteer/blob/main/src/common/USKeyboardLayout.ts
actions.duration: How long to wait in milliseconds. Only for wait action.
actions.directory: The directory path for the media. Overrides the default directory config. Default is config.imageDirectory or config.videoDirectory depending on the file type.
actions.filename: Default is test.id + action object number.
